attributes.action: Children should not have to wait years to get braces on the NHS
attributes.background: Children who have bad teeth are being told to wait 5 years to have braces and there are kids with straight teeth having braces in front of the NHS waiting list,children who feel insucure and kids who have bad teeth should go first.

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about the availability of braces but we are not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly the action you would like taken.
